messages.message: hi team, there's a cypress test (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/21043/overview/7be74b0d-88e8-49b7-bc98-429738576de1?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1) failing on uat starting from 7/28 regarding running apps w/ sample files as a logged out user, it can't seem to find the app to run though when i navigate to the hub as a logged out user i can find both apps. it could be that not all the apps are loading so the cypress test is failing. hoping someone can take a look

I faintly recall we wanted to no longer support the login-less experience, which would include this.

Is that the case @jack.robbins @Xindi Xu or am I misremembering?
The login-less experience is still supported, but we can make a call to stop supporting it now
